title: "DystoWall"
content:
ðŸ‘‹ Welcome to DystoWall!

We are a website dedicated to providing you with the most striking and thought-provoking dystopian wallpapers available. Our selection features stunning illustrations of dark, futuristic worlds, complete with metallic textures and digital glitch effects.

Whether you're a fan of cyberpunk, post-apocalyptic fiction, or just love the edgy aesthetic of dystopian art, we have something for you. Our wallpapers are perfect for adding a touch of darkness and intrigue to your desktop, phone, or tablet.

At DystoWall, we believe that art has the power to inspire and challenge us, and we hope that our wallpapers will do just that. So why settle for a boring, generic wallpaper when you can showcase your love for all things dystopian? Browse our collection today and find your new favorite wallpaper.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper featuring a stylized illustration of a dystopian future, with metallic textures and digital glitch effects."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
